game.name: Click here to edit game name
Mortal Kombat II
game.desc: Mortal Kombat II, is a fighting game on Playstation 3. Combos, fatalities and other special moves, these are the ingredients that underpin the success of a game renowned for the violence of its confrontations. The player embodies one of 12 characters and must defeat all of his direct competitors one by one to win the tournament and put an end to the reign of the evil Shao Kahn.

game.name: Mortal Kombat
game.desc: Mortal Kombat or Mortal Kombat 9 is a fighting video game, with a two-dimensional plane and three-dimensional graphics. The ninth installment in the Mortal Kombat series, it was developed by NetherRealm Studios (formerly known as Midway Games) and published exclusively under license from Warner Bros. The game begins right during the final events of Mortal Kombat: Armageddon. During the final confrontation between the forces of good and evil at the pyramid of Argus, nearly all warriors on both sides perish, with only Emperor Shao Kahn and Raiden, the God of Thunder, remaining standing.

game.name: MotorStorm - Apocalypse
game.desc: MotorStorm Apocalypse is a racing game for PS3. Take part in rides in the middle of an apocalyptic city where the tracks and the entire setting are collapsing. The track layout changes and you can influence the environment through QTEs. Compete against up to ten opponents on different destructing tracks.

game.name: Mousecraft
game.desc: Puzzle-Game for PS3, MouseCraft gives the player the mission to lead mice from their wheel to a piece of cheese. To make them avoid enemies, acid baths etc., he will have to place blocks on their way.

game.name: Mugen Souls Z
game.desc: Mugen Souls Z is an RPG with a manga aesthetic released on PS3. The player embodies one of the twelve ultimate gods, a young girl who decides to gather their powers to counter an evil threat. She will soon meet Chou-Chou, the heroine of the previous episode.

game.name: Mugen Souls
game.desc: Mugen Souls is a tactical RPG for PlayStation 3. Chou-Chou is a young lady who wants to rule the world. With the help of companions, she must fight monsters and charm as many people as possible to achieve her goals.

game.name: Mushroom Wars
game.desc: Mushroom Wars on PS3 is a real-time strategy game that consists of a Skirmish mode on 18 levels and a Campaign mode with 25 missions. During the latter, you must take the upper hand over your opponent. Finally, you can listen to your own music during the game.

game.name: Namco Museum Essentials
game.desc: Namco Museum Essentials is a compilation of arcade games for Playstation 3. This compilation includes six games: Pac-Man, Xevious, Galaga, DigDug, Dragon Spirit, and a new version of Xevious : Xevious Resurrection. Players can now relive the arcade era for several hours of play.

game.name: Narco Terror
game.desc: Narco Terror is a wild, collateral-justice twin-stick shooter that combines the magnetism and atmosphere of 80's movies and games, with high-def visuals and overwhelming, destructive chaos. The campaign supports co-op play with up to two players on a single machine, or online co-op with players able to drop in or drop out at any point.

game.name: Naughty Bear : Panic in Paradise
game.desc: When the Bears of Perfection Island went on holiday to Paradise Island, Naughty Bear was not invited! Naughty Bear manages to secretly travel with the other bears, duct-taped to the exterior of the bus. With a list of bears who wronged him in hands, Naughty is ready to make them pay, one by one.

game.name: Need for Speed : Hot Pursuit
game.desc: Need for Speed Hot Pursuit brings the franchise back to its roots with intense cops vs. racer chases. The game features Need for Speed Autolog where players compare racing stats and automatically get personalized gameplay recommendations from their friends. Need for Speed Hot Pursuit players can also experience the thrill of the chase and the rush of the escape as they play through full careers as both a cop and a racer - solo or connected. The high speed busts and heart-stopping getaways are all connected via Need for Speed Autolog.

game.name: Need for Speed : Most Wanted
game.desc:
Do you have what it takes to become Most Wanted? Designed for a new, more connected generation of racing fans, Need for Speed Most Wanted offers players an expansive open world packed with exhilarating action where they can choose their own path to become the Most Wanted. Players will have the freedom to drive anywhere, discover hidden gameplay, takedown rivals, challenge friends or just hang out and toy with the cops. Everything they do counts towards the end goal of becoming #1 on their personal Most Wanted List.
The only rule in Need for Speed Most Wanted is to race without rules. There's a start and a finish to every race -- but how the player races, where and when they choose to compete, and the skills they choose to compete with -- are all up to the player. It isn't enough to be the Most Wanted amongst rivals and cops. Now players will fight for ultimate bragging rights amongst their friends thanks to Autolog. In Need for Speed Most Wanted, everything players do will earn Speed Points that will take them up the Most Wanted list, from competing for best race times and battling cops in pursuits for the highest scores, to catching the most air off a huge ramp and more -- if there?s something to do, there's someone to beat.

game.name: Need for Speed : The Run
game.desc: It's called The Run. An illicit, high-stakes race across the country. The only way to get your life back is to be the first from San Francisco to New York. No speed limits. No rules. No allies. All you have are your driving skills and sheer determination as you battle hundreds of the world's most notorious drivers on the country's most dangerous roads. In Need for Speed The Run, you'll weave through dense urban centers, rocket down icy mountain passes and navigate narrow canyons at breakneck speeds, all the while evading a relentless police force prepared - and willing - to use lethal force to take you down.

game.name: Ninja Gaiden 3 : Razor's Edge
game.desc: Ninja Gaiden 3: Razor's Edge on PS3 is a bloody action game that puts the player in the shoes of Ryu Hayabusa, a ninja whose skill is matched only by his mastery of the katana. This time, it's in London that our favourite limb-slicer will play the dragon's sword against bellicose terrorists.

game.name: Ninja Gaiden Sigma
game.desc: Ninja Gaiden Sigma is an upgraded, more complete version of "Ninja Gaiden Black." As a new element in this version, Rachel, the heroine, is playable. The main character Ryu Hayabusa also features new actions, new weapons, and new combinations. Of course, the level of visual detail is enhanced from previous iterations.

game.name: Nitroplus Blasterz Heroines Infinite Duel
game.desc: NitroPlus Blasterz Heroines Infinite Duel is a 2D fighting game featuring female characters from the modest publisher NitroPlus. Developed by XSEED it is scheduled for winter 2015 in America and possibly Europe....

game.name: Noby Noby Boy
game.desc: Noby Noby Boy is an atypical game to download on PS3. You play as BOY, a creature that has the ability to stretch its body at will and gobble up anything it finds. The more you stretch your creature, the more you will also make the GIRL creature grow. The GIRL starts from Earth and tries to reach other planets. Players from all over the world work together to make GIRL grow. When she reaches a star, a new environment is available to play in!

game.name: Nova-111
game.desc: An adventure game for PS4, Nova-111 plunges you into a science fiction universe where you must fight aliens in space in the name of science. Enjoy a unique gameplay combining turn-based and real-time actions.

game.name: Novastrike
game.desc: Novastrike on the Playstation Store is a shoot'em up in which you control a prototype named Scythe. The goal is to repel an alien invasion with a sophisticated arsenal on 7 levels that you can visit as you please, each with its own objective. The weapons, 9 in number, have 3 levels of upgrade and are used to repel the enemy in the air as well as on the ground.

game.name: Numblast
game.desc: In Numblast, a puzzle-game for PS3, you have to rotate cells to match similar numbers. The particularity of this puzzle-game lies in its countdown system. Indeed, when you match 4 cells of the same number, they will start to count down unless you feed the combo by making other number cells touch each other in turn to create better combos.

game.name: Odin Sphere - Leifthrasir
game.desc:
The tale of Armageddon is about to be told...
In the world of Erion, the magical kingdom of Valentine held an enormous power. The "Cauldron" -- the source of this great power-- Maintained the kingdom's prosperity. However, Valentine suffered a sudden, mysterious downfall.
And so the neighboring kingdoms clashed over the now-masterless Cauldron. The never-ending war intensified day by day. Is the world truly progressing towards it's destruction, as stated in Erion's "Prophesy of Armageddon"?

game.name: Okami Hd
game.desc: Six years after the release of the original, Okami finally graces a new generation of consoles on the PS3 as a downloadable title via the PlayStation Network. With full, native 1080p graphics, Okami HD breathes new life into the classic hit. Okami HD also takes full advantage of the PS®Move motion controller, providing players with a new way to play. With newly enhanced visuals, optional Move controls, and the ability to earn trophies, Okami HD is the definitive version to own!

game.name: One Piece : Pirate Warriors
game.desc: One Piece: Pirate Warriors is a beat'em all on PS3. Built on the model of Dynasty Warriors, the game offers missions in which you have to conquer territories to prevent the enemy from advancing. Other phases of the game involve contextual actions in more platform/action oriented scenes. The story follows the main lines of the original manga.

game.name: Orc Attack : Flatulent Rebellion
game.desc: Fart or die in this hack-and-slash action game, where fun-loving Orcs battle pollution loving Humans in a humorous fantasy setting. Orcs have become victims of brutal Human expansion, as they are carelessly poisoning the environment. Now, four trained Orc heroes are retaliating with a Not-So-Silent yet very deadly plan. In either single-player or up to four-player co-op, you will take on the role of Orcs, each wielding a unique gaseous ability, and then take the fight to the Humans in a stinky, fart-filled romp. Hilarious enemies and highly tuned combat make for a joyous experience that really is worth sharing. While the comedic storyline and the striking 3D world make it even more memorable. Gross but charming protagonists add the final flourish with flatulent group attacks and nasty killer moves for up to four players.

game.name: Pac-man Championship Edition Dx
game.desc:
The mazes, the ghosts, the pellets. It's a Pac-Man game in looks, but not entirely in gameplay.
Unlike past editions or the original itself, Championship Edition DX twists the games style in a new direction, where the play field is littered with hundreds of ghosts that, when awoken as you move past, follow you in a conga line. Eat a power pellet and you can turn that line of ghosts into a massive points score, which in turns increases the speed of play. There are now two defensive tactics that can help you along the way as well. Pick up and use a bomb, and all the ghosts on the play field will be shot back to the central holding area for a few seconds. The speed will also suddenly slow down to a 'bullet time' like effect if you're too close to a ghost, giving you a chance to evade and continue on without losing a life.

game.name: Pac-man Museum
game.desc: Pac-Man Museum is a compilation available for download on Xbox Live from Xbox 360. The game offers you to relive more than 30 years of Pac-Man through the classics of the franchise, starting with his debut in 1980, but also more recent titles, like the Pac-Man Championship Edition released in 2007.

game.name: Papo & Yo
game.desc: Papo & Yo is a puzzle and platform game available for download on PlayStation 3. The player plays as Quico and must cure a monster representing his alcoholic father. To do this, he must progress through an imaginary world by modifying the environment and using the beast's special features.

game.name: Payday : The Heist
game.desc: Payday: The Heist is a 4 player cooperative FPS for PS3. As a bank robber with 3 friends, your goal is to enter the premises, complete a series of objectives and escape, all while resisting regular assaults by law enforcement.

game.name: Payday 2
game.desc: Payday 2 is a first-person shooter for PS3. With three other players, you organize a heist and try to escape with your loot. You can stay low-key and never set off an alarm, or you can charge in and confront law enforcement. Some elements of the missions are random, forcing you to change your plans with each game.

game.path: ./Penny Arcade Adventures On The Rain Slick Precipice of Darkness Episode One.m3u
game.name: Penny Arcade Adventures : On the Rain-Slick Precip
game.desc: Penny Arcade Adventures: On the Rain-Slick Precipice of Darkness for Playstation 3 is a mix between role-playing and classic adventure. Featuring a character editor, the utterly deranged title (like the webcomic it's based on) sends you on a hunt for a giant robot that destroys everything in its path. Investigate and fight against wacky enemies in a cartoonish universe.

game.path: ./Penny Arcade Adventures On The Rain Slick Precipice of Darkness Episode Two.m3u
game.name: Penny Arcade Adventures : On the Rain-Slick Precip
game.desc: This second episode of Penny Arcade Adventures on PS3 features detectives Gabe and Tycho in a 1920s landscape. The duo must fight savage enemies and solve the mysteries buried in the heart of New Arcadia. The role-playing aspect is more in-depth this time and the avatars' customization is now more precise.

game.name: Persona 4 : Arena
game.desc: Persona 4: The Ultimate in Mayonaka Arena is a fighting game featuring the characters from Persona 4 and Persona 3. Taking place one year after the fourth opus, it features Story, Arcade, Versus and Score Attack modes.

game.name: Pixeljunk Eden
game.desc: PixelJunk Eden is a psychedelic platformer for PS3. In an ever-changing alien environment, the player must make his way through lush vegetation, eliminate strange enemies and search for treasures. Up to 3 players can play in cooperative mode.

game.name: Pixeljunk Monsters
game.desc: Pixeljunk Monsters is an old-fashioned game downloadable via the Playstation 3's PSN. As a village chief, you must save the inhabitants from a monster invasion by building towers in the forest.

game.name: Puzzle Agent
game.desc: In the puzzle game Puzzle Agent on the Playstation Store, the player takes on the role of FBI detective Nelson Tethers, who must find out why the Scoggins gum factory has suddenly closed. The investigation is spread out in the form of multiple small puzzles to solve. You are graded according to the number of mistakes you make and the number of clues you use.

game.name: Rainbow Six Vegas
game.desc: Rainbow Six Vegas on PS3 is a first-person shooter that is all about tactics. You lead an elite commando team in the middle of Las Vegas, which finds itself engaged in numerous and perilous infiltration missions and arrests of notorious criminals. To help you in your adventure, you have a wide range of weapons at your disposal.

game.name: Sleeping Dogs
game.desc: Sleeping Dogs is a gritty and visceral open-world cop drama set in the vibrant city of Hong Kong. Sleeping Dogs catapults players into the role of undercover cop Wei Shen, tasked with taking down one of the world's most fearsome criminal organisations from the inside... the Hong Kong Triads. As players explore the bustling and crowded Hong Kong island, through its neon-lit side streets and sprawling street markets, an incredible story unfolds of loyalty and betrayal, where Wei begins to question his own motives as he is sucked in deeper than he could ever imagine. Offering players an island packed with action, every street corner, market stall, harbour dock or city skyscraper can become an opportunity for intense shoot-outs, adrenaline-fuelled street races and intense, brutal martial arts combat. Featuring one of the most intuitive and imaginative combat systems, Sleeping Dogs empowers players to perform an extensive set of martial arts moves, singlehandedly taking on numerous opponents. Players perform bone-crunching kicks and combos, vicious counters and a cinematic set of environmental takedowns making use of countless real-world items from circular saws to phone booths, incinerators to refrigerator doors.

game.name: Sly Cooper : Thieves in Time
game.desc: The pages of the Thievius Raccoonus are disappearing and the gang must get back together and save the Cooper Clan legacy from being destroyed forever in this fourth edition of the stealthy platforming franchise.

game.name: Smash Cars
game.desc: Smash Cars is a racing game for Playstation 3. The title, already released on Playstation 2, has been given a graphical facelift on the PS3. Step on the gas in these remote-controlled car races. Choose between buggies, monster trucks, and sports cars (all customisable), and launch yourself into the most insane stunts. In solo or multiplayer mode, try to win as many trophies as possible.

game.name: Snakeball
game.desc: Slide across the game area, collect the coloured balls and earn as many points as possible before the time runs out. Welcome to SnakeBall on the Playstation Network! Hone your skills in single-player and challenge modes, then take on your friends in 4-player split-screen mode or compete for the ultimate title in heated online games. There are four game modes and over 30 levels to master. Play as one of the sixteen available riders.

game.name: Sniper Elite III
game.desc: Featuring a greater focus on player agency/choice and expansive environments filled with opportunities for distinct play styles, and set in the exotic yet deadly terrain of North Africa during World War II, Sniper Elite 3 sees American OSS agent Karl Fairburne deep behind Nazi lines, providing crucial sharpshooter skills as the Allies battle Germany's fearsome Tiger tanks across the Western Desert. But it's not just the famed Afrika Korps that Karl has to worry about; he soon uncovers German plans to build a 'wunderwaffe' – a 'wonder weapon' – with the power to crush any Allied forces in its path, and turn the tide of the whole war.

game.name: Sniper : Ghost Warrior 2
game.desc: If sniping in real life "outside of the whole morality issue" was as easy as it is in Sniper: Ghost Warrior 2, then a few soldiers probably could save the world. Unless you?re playing on the hardest mode, bullet-drop indicators and omniscient AI teammates make sure you know exactly who to shoot and when, taking almost all the tension out of pulling the trigger. Ghost Warrior 2 ultimately does exactly what I feared the most when I started: it takes one of the highest forms of shooting skill and makes it repetitive and uninteresting.

game.name: Söldner-X : Himmelsstürmer
game.desc: Söldner-X: Himmelsstürmer is a shoot'em up available for download from the Playstation Store. Adopting a very classic 2D horizontal scrolling gameplay, this game puts you in control of the only ship capable of destroying the infection that threatens humanity. You'll need good reflexes to complete the four levels and unlock the bonus level.

game.name: Söldner-X 2 : Final Prototype
game.desc: Söldner-X 2: Final Prototype is a side-scrolling shooter available for download on the Playstation 3 PSN. Make your way through seven levels to defeat the Aarg threat. The title features a local multiplayer option that allows you to invite a friend to help you out.

game.name: Sonic & All-Stars Racing Transformed
game.desc: Sonic & All Stars Racing Transformed is a racing game for PlayStation 3. The player can take on the role of 22 different drivers and race on 20 tracks from the Sega universe in cars, planes and boats. In addition, it is possible to compete against 9 other players online.

game.name: Sonic Adventure 2
game.desc: Sonic Adventure 2 is a platform game for PS3, which marks the appearance of the character Shadow. Hero or Dark, make your team composed of three characters evolve towards its respective goal. The progression alternates between search, shooting and platforming phases. The title offers a 2-player mode with several activities.

game.name: Sonic Adventure
game.desc: Sonic Adventure is the first appearance of the blue hedgehog entirely in three dimensions, and it was originally on Dreamcast before being adapted much later on the PSN of the Playstation 3. Six playable characters, rich and varied environments faithful to the spirit of the series, the side quest of the Chaos, a kind of small Tamagotchi that must be raised in order to participate in mini-games, are the ingredients of this supersonic platformer.

game.name: Sonic Cd
game.desc: Sonic CD is a platform game for Playstation 3. Players aim to complete levels at full speed by collecting the maximum of rings while fighting increasingly tough opponents.

game.name: Sonic Generations
game.desc: Sonic Generations for Playstation 3 is a platformer in which you control the famous blue hedgehog. You can choose a classic 2D view or opt for a more modern 3D viewpoint to navigate the levels from previous installments in the series.

game.name: Sonic The Fighters
game.desc: Sonic Championship is a 3D fighting game, featuring characters from the Sonic the Hedgehog franchise. The background story is that Doctor Eggman built the Death Egg II, a new version of his facility that appeared in previous games. Stopping him requires Chaos Emeralds, and various individuals including heroes like Sonic the Hedgehog and Miles "Tails" Prower participate in a fighting tournament to gather them. In total there are eight playable characters (nine in later console releases) and two bosses (Metal Sonic and Doctor Eggman).Gameplay is mostly typical for a versus fighter, it is a one-on-one fight on a best two out of three basis. Players use jumps, punches, kicks and special weapons. Bean the Dynamite for example, a duck-like character who makes his debut in the Sonic universe, uses bombs. Blocking is done by making use of a limited supply of barriers. The whole action is illustrated in a comical fashion though, like one would expect from a Sonic game.

game.name: Sonic The Hedgehog 2
game.desc: Sonic the Hedgehog 2 on the PSN (re-release of the Megadrive version) offers a new approach to the game with the appearance of Sonic's now famous companion: Tails. The player has the choice to approach the title in two different ways: ignore the enemies and rings and rely only on pure speed to complete the eleven levels or relentless exploration for the more patient. Both characters can be played simultaneously in co-op mode on the same screen.

game.name: Sonic The Hedgehog
game.desc: Sonic The Hedgehog brings the popular character back to his high-velocity roots, for a new dimension of entertainment. In his first adventure set in the human world, Sonic meets a beautiful princess named Elise -- queen of Soleanna, the beautiful city of water. When she's kidnapped by Dr. Eggman, Sonic enters the world of humans to fight the menacing doctor to thwart his malicious plans. As he stops Eggman's plans to destroy this special kingdom of hers, Sonic will encounter and interact with new allies and enemies, like the mysterious, supernatural Silver. As Sonic speeds through the huge kingdom, the mysteries unravel.

game.name: Sonic Unleashed
game.desc: Sonic Unleashed on PS3 brings the famous blue hedgehog to life in a new kind of adventure. Mixing 3D and 2D, the title pits you against Dr Robotnik who has scattered the pieces of the world. It's up to you to find the pieces of the emerald of chaos and put it back together. The software manages the day/night cycle, which influences Sonic's behaviour.

game.name: Sorcery
game.desc: Become Finn a young sorcerer apprentice who must use his newly acquired magic skills on his travels deep into the heart of the Faerie Kingdom. Along the way, Finn must master the various types of magic – arcane, earth, ice, fire, wind, and lightning – in order to stay alive, and to become truly deserving of bearing the title sorcerer. The PlayStation Move becomes your very own magic wand to conjure up core spells, such as attack, defend and enchant.

game.name: SoulCalibur : Lost Swords
game.desc: Like previous games in the series, Soulcalibur: Lost Swords was a weapon-based fighting game. Players could inflict high and low horizontal and vertical attacks, block oncoming attacks, and use parries to gain a tactical advantage. Features such as Soul Crush and Armor Destruction first introduced in Soulcalibur IV have been retained; Soul Crush could be used to make opponents drop collectible items and weapons. Several mechanics were no longer present in the game, however, such as the ability to ring out a character, counter hits, and Just Guard. Guard Impact, while having the same properties as Soulcalibur V, no longer used a specific meter to execute. Two new mechanics were added: Weapon Arts, which granted each character unique attacks such as breaking through an enemy's guards; and support character feature, which allowed players to temporarily borrow another player's character online.

game.name: Sound Shapes
game.desc: Sound Shapes on PS3 is a musical platform game. This means that you directly influence the game's soundtrack by collecting little by little bonuses present in the levels. You thus add new notes to the music. A level editor is also present and allows you to share your creations with players around the world.

game.name: South Park - The Stick of Truth
game.desc: Earn your place alongside Stan, Kyle, Kenny and Cartman and aid them in a hysterical adventure to save South Park as only fourth-graders can. From the creators of South Park, Trey Parker and Matt Stone, comes an epic quest to become ... cool. You begin as the new kid in town facing a harrowing challenge: making friends. As you start your quest the children of South Park are embroiled in a city-wide, live-action-role-playing game, casting imaginary spells and swinging fake swords. Over time the simple children's game escalates into a battle of good and evil that threatens to consume the world. Arm yourself with weapons of legend to defeat crabpeople, underpants gnomes, hippies and other forces of evil. Discover the lost Stick of Truth and earn your place at the side of Stan, Kyle, Cartman and Kenny as their new friend. Succeed, and you shall be South Park's savior, cementing your social status in South Park Elementary. Fail, and you will forever be known ... as a loser.

game.name: Space Ace
game.desc: Ace's girlfriend, the beautiful Kimberley, has been kidnapped by the infamous Borf, who also has ambitions to enslave the Earth and its inhabitants with a laser beam that turns everything he touches into a baby. The saving of the world begins with Space Ace on Playstation 3, an interactive cartoon based on your reflexes.

game.name: Space Channel 5 : Part 2
game.desc: Space Channel 5: Part 2 is a rhythm game for Playstation 3. Join Ulala, the famous Space Channel 5 reporter, and help her save humanity. A band of hideous aliens are forcing people to dance for their own pleasure. Take to the dance floor alone, or in pairs to enjoy the joys of disco music, and perhaps dance with Michael Jackson's lookalike, Space Michael.

game.name: Space Hulk
game.desc: Based on the best-selling board game and set in the Warhammer 40,000 universe, this edition of Space Hulk by Full Control Games is a 3D digital turn based strategy game that recreates the classic claustrophobic board game experience for single player and multiplayer play. Space Hulk is set in the isolated corridors and tomb-like chambers of an ancient vessel lost in the graveyard of space. Players lead a small army of fearless Space Marine Terminators to battle in a ferocious fight for survival against hordes of predatory alien Genestealers.

game.name: Space Invaders Infinity Gene
game.desc:
Space Invaders Infinity Gene is a new take on the arcade game Space Invaders.
The game starts off identical to the original game, but quickly begins to evolve as the player scores points and progress through stages, allowing unrestricted movement around the entire screen, automatic rapid fire of multiple types of weapons, and power ups that increase the strength of the player's weaponry.
New enemies also appear, as well as the Space Invaders from the original game, regularly popping up to threaten the player. Bosses also turn up in certain stages, where the player must alternate between attacking and dodging their shots. The game also features a special trick called the Nagoya Attack, where the player can earn extra points by flying through an enemy shot when it is first fired and transparent.

game.name: Spare Parts
game.desc: Spare Parts is a platform video game developed by EA Bright Light and published by Electronic Arts. It features cooperative gameplay for up to two players. Players can unlock new abilities which can be upgraded, and can also unlock new characters to play as. The story revolves around a pair of robots which become stranded on a planet by a race known as the Krofax. As the robots explore the planet they discover an abandoned spaceship. The ship's computer (voiced by Simon Pegg) informs them that they can find the parts necessary to repair the ship scattered throughout the planet. The robots then set off to find the necessary parts in the hopes of escaping the planet.

game.name: Spartacus Legends
game.desc: Spartacus Legends on PS3 is a gladiatorial combat game adapted from the American television series Spartacus. Featuring a free-to-play business model, it offers accessible battles allowing you to make thousands of combinations, a skill system allowing you to develop your own gladiator, as well as an online and offline multiplayer mode with world rankings.

game.name: Spec Ops : The Line
game.desc: Spec Ops The Line is a narrative driven, 3rd-person military shooter, set in a sandstorm ravaged, war-torn, present day Dubai.It's been six months since Dubai was wiped off the map by a cataclysmic sandstorm. Thousands of lives have been lost, including those of American soldiers sent to help evacuate the city. Today, the city lies buried under sand - the world's most opulent ruin.Now, a radio signal is broadcasting from Dubai. A Delta Force team is sent to infiltrate the city and find its source.Their mission is simple: Locate survivors and radio for evacuation. What they find is a city in the grip of a violent struggle for control. In order to fulfil their mission, they'll have to find the man at the heart of this madness - the elusive Col. John Konrad.

game.name: Spelunker Hd
game.desc: Spelunker HD is a Playstation 3 platformer available for download from the Playstation Store. The title offers you to play as a miner, in various environments, in search of objects and bonuses. The game can be played by up to 6 players online.

game.name: Spelunky
game.desc: Spelunky is a unique platformer with randomized levels that offer a challenging new experience each time you play. Journey deep underground and explore fantastic places filled with all manner of monsters, traps, and treasure. Go solo or bring up to three friends to join you in cooperative play or frantic deathmatch!

game.name: Splinter Cell Blacklist
game.desc:
The game starts with Sam Fisher and his old friend Victor Coste who are about to depart from Andersen Air Force Base in Guam when an unknown enemy force destroys the entire base. Assisted by hacker specialist Charlie Cole, Sam and Vic manage to escape, although Vic is severely injured from protecting Sam from a grenade. Soon after, a terrorist organization calling itself "The Engineers" claims responsibility for the attack and announces that this attack is the first of a deadly countdown of escalating attacks on United States assets which they call "The Blacklist." They declare that they will halt the attacks only after the U.S. Government recalls all American troops deployed abroad.
In response, President of the United States Patricia Caldwell, who had just shut down the corrupt Third Echelon, assigns Fisher, Charlie Cole, Isaac Briggs and Anna 'Grim' Grímsdóttir to a newly created special operations and counter-terrorism unit called "Fourth Echelon." She installs Sam as the commander and charges the unit with the task of hunting down The Engineers and stopping them. Fourth Echelon's base of operations is a customizable cargo plane, codenamed "Paladin."
Sam and his new team's first course of action is to capture Andriy Kobin from a CIA safe house in Benghazi, Libya and obtain information from which they can learn more about The Engineers' plans. Sam successfully extracts Kobin and arrests him, keeping him aboard the Paladin. Kobin reveals some information about his business associates in Mirawa, Iraq. Infiltrating an insurgent stronghold there, Sam learns that the Blacklist attacks are more serious than originally thought. Sam arrives at a death chamber to find an executed US soldier whose execution was taped. The executioner was Majid Sadiq (Carlo Rota),[7] a terrorist and former MI6 agent. In the video, Sadiq directly tells Sam to stop intervening or suffer the consequences.
Intelligence from Mirawa points to the next Blacklist attack being in Dallas, Texas. Sam asserts to Fourth Echelon that a direct attack would be too simple and that the true target is another city. Charlie notes that the TSA list of "do not fly" citizens was offline for roughly six hours with a group of men traveling through Chicago's O'Hare International Airport during the time the list was offline. The target is a water filtration plant off Navy Pier, which is scheduled to release a hazardous biological agent into the water supply of Chicago. Sam stops the devices and shuts off the outflow valve, sparing Chicago.
Kobin reveals to Sam back on the Paladin intelligence about one of his associates, a dealer named Reza Nouri who supplies mercenaries for hire. Sam assaults his mansion in Ciudad del Este, Paraguay and interrogates Nouri. Nouri states that to whom he lends his men is none of Sam's business. During the interrogation, Nouri's mansion comes under attack from suspected operators of Quds Force. Nouri agrees to give up Sadiq in exchange for a safe extraction.
Grim and Charlie gain intelligence about a sleeper cell of The Engineers in London, England. The cell has been activated and Sam infiltrates an abandoned mill to gain intelligence on The Engineers' next plans. Sam finds shipping documents from Iran, confirming the suspicion that Iran and Quds Force were involved in the Blacklist attacks. With the last of the chemical bombs about to leave the shipping bay, Sam sneaks onto the truck and places a GPS tracking device inside the bomb. Sam is exposed to near lethal amounts of the chemical agent and, while trying to exfiltrate, is captured alive by Sadiq. Briggs, who was providing sniper overwatch, is forced to rescue Sam, but lets Sadiq escape.
After healing from the exposure to the chemical weapons, Sam infiltrates the former US embassy in Tehran, Iran, which has been transformed into a Quds Force headquarters. Sam installs a flash drive on a mainframe computer given to him by Charlie, which is programmed to search and rip anything related to the Blacklist attacks. The flash drive reveals nothing, proving that Iran is not behind the Blacklist attacks, reversing previous suspicions.
Back on the Paladin, Briggs informs Sam that the GPS tracker placed inside the bomb in London has reached US soil in Philadelphia, Pennsylvania. Grim analyzes that there are a total of four bombs containing hazardous nerve agents. The bombs arrive at the transit yards in Philadelphia, forcing Sam and Briggs to disarm the bombs before the nerve agents are released into the mass transit system. Grim's analysis also assess that a high value Engineer target is present. After Sam and Briggs successfully defuse the fourth bomb, Sam gives chase to the Engineer leader in the transit system. The Engineer escapes the train, but is shot dead on site by responding police officers.
Returning to the Paladin empty handed, Fourth Echelon is given a break when Nouri is checked in as a prisoner in Guantanamo Bay, Cuba. Sam and Briggs form a plan to break into Guantanamo to interrogate Nouri again under Briggs' CIA credentials. Sam successfully interrogates Nouri who confirms that Sadiq is the mastermind behind the Blacklist attacks, but is unable to tell Sam when the next attack will be. Nouri also admits that Sadiq knows of Fourth Echelon and is aware of the team's individual identities. Sam evades capture and escapes the prison, riding off from the bay with the help of Briggs in a boat. Briggs drives himself and Sam to the Paladin, which has landed at an airstrip in the Yucatán province of Mexico.
Before Fourth Echelon can take off, the Paladin comes under assault by terrorists. Sam and Fourth Echelon fight off the attack, which Charlie reveals was his fault for contacting an old friend while landed. After taking off, the Paladin comes under a cyberattack directly from Sadiq. All of the intelligence on board the Paladin is compromised, as well as the on-board computers, leading the Paladin towards a crash in the Gulf of Mexico. Fourth Echelon successfully regains control of the Paladin, averting the crash. During the cyberattack, Sadiq successfully executes the "American Fuel" Blacklist attack on Sabine Pass, Louisiana, the largest oil reserve in the US.
While the US government activates continuity of government procedures, Sam assaults Sabine Pass, shutting down the leaking oil from reaching other reserve posts, averting a chain reaction. Another high value Engineer is present, to whom Sam gives chase. The Engineer reveals the true and final plans of Sadiq: to extract all US military secrets. Knowing continuity of government procedures, Sadiq successfully kidnaps a group of high level civilian and military personnel, including the Secretary Of Defense, and holds them at the Site F government bunker under Denver International Airport (DIA).
Fourth Echelon calls President Caldwell, who directly orders Fourth Echelon to divert from Denver. The Paladin pilots refuse to defy orders, so Sam orders Kobin to relieve the pilots of duty. Kobin successfully drops Briggs and Sam during a blackout landing at Denver. Briggs and Sam assault DIA, tasked with planting a virus which Charlie custom-built to safeguard against the transfer of files to Sadiq. Briggs surrenders to Sadiq in the computer terminal, separated from the other hostages. Sadiq's men torture the Secretary of Defense into complying with their demands, but Briggs intervenes, killing the Secretary before he can begin the data transfer.
The Engineers attempts to flee Site F using Briggs and the other hostages as human shields. It is revealed that Sam is disguised in an Air Force uniform at the very rear of the hostage group. Sam breaks free from his captors as Delta Force marksmen open fire on Sadiq and his men, and Sadiq escapes on foot after wounding Briggs. An unarmed Sam gives chase, disarming and assaulting Sadiq, before wounding him and taking him into custody. Even upon defeat, Sadiq claims that he has already "won," threatening Sam that if he kills him, the twelve nations who are secretly backing The Engineers will rise and if he puts him on trial, he will "spill every secret he knows." Leaving him with no choice, Sam employs the Fifth Freedom and unofficially imprisons Sadiq, while President Caldwell announces that he is killed and the game ends with Fourth Echelon prepares to continue operations. In the post-credits, it is revealed that Vic had recovered from his injuries and both he and Sam are seen about to interrogate the captive Sadiq.

game.name: Splinter Cell Double Agent
game.desc: Splinter Cell Double Agent is an infiltration game for Playstation 3. You play as Sam Fisher again, this time as a double agent. In the game, his morals and loyalty to his employers and his country are paramount. He must do everything to protect his cover, which is what keeps him on the edge of his seat throughout the title. It is up to you to make the right choices, which will directly influence the scenario and the story.

game.name: Sports Champions 2
game.desc: Sports Champions 2, sequel to the best-selling PlayStation Move title, is getting back in the ring with an exciting range of new sports. Using single or double motion controllers, you will have the opportunity to compete against friends in all-new events including Boxing, Golf, Bowling, Skiing and Tennis, and hit the bullseye with an updated Archery mode. Sport Champions 2 will bring your family a fun and competitive experience that everyone will want to be a part of.With the new Party Mode you will have the chance to compete with friends and family in custom and multi-sport tournaments. Create player profiles with individual stat tracking and customise your character to personalise your sports experience.Everything you loved about the original Sports Champions is right here in the sequel; Cup play (solo campaign), Free Play, Challenges (arcade events), online leaderboards and Facebook connectivity will all feature in the exciting new game. All of this combined with full stereoscopic 3D support plus PlayStation Network features make Sports Champions 2 the must have fun filled family sports game in 2012.

game.name: Sports Champions
game.desc: Sports Champions on PS3 is a collection of sports activities using the Playstation Move. There are ping pong, tennis, archery, golf, gladiatorial combat, etc.

game.name: Stacking
game.desc: Explore a world of ancient times populated by living Russian dolls. Embrace over 100 unique dolls and use their special abilities to solve a variety of puzzles and challenges. Play as Charlie Blackmore, the world's smallest Russian doll, and embark on an adventure to save Charlie's family from the clutches of an evil industrialist called the "Baron". This original 3D, third-person adventure takes you to places like the bustling Royal Railway Station and even aboard an airship. Along the way, find unique dolls and doll sets and collect them in Charlie's Stash, a place where you can retrace all your adventures.

game.name: Star Raiders
game.desc: The action game Star Raiders, available for download on the Playstation Network for the Playstation 3, is a remake of the first ever space battle game released in 1979, placing the player in control of a spaceship in a first person view. The player must destroy enemy ships as they traverse the galaxy.

game.name: Star Trek : D-A-C
game.desc: Star Trek: D.A.C. on PS3 is a shoot'em up based on the 2009 feature film. The title allows up to 12 players to compete over the internet in three different game modes. There are the classic Team Death Matches, a Conquest mode that requires you to take over specific points and finally an Assault mode in which you must defend or invade specific areas.

game.name: Star Trek
game.desc:
The award-winning Star Trek game casts players for the first time ever as Kirk and Spock in a totally original co-op experience worthy of gamers and fans. Set in the new canon of director and producer J.J. Abrams? Star Trek (2009) reboot, players will be immersed in the game?s rich story and action-packed combat.
Under development by acclaimed Ontario-based developers Digital Extremes (Bioshock 2, Dark Sector, The Darkness 2), Star Trek features an original story by BAFTA award winner and God of War writer, Marianne Krawczyk, in collaboration with the writer/producers of the new Star Trek films, Bob Orci, Alex Kurtzman and Damon Lindelof.
Meet the Crew- The 2009 Star Trek film cast will be contributing their voices for the game, including Chris Pine as Kirk and Zachary Quinto as Spock.
Original Standalone Story? Set after the events of the Star Trek (2009) reboot, continue the sweeping journey through the new universe with a completely original story
Ultimate Co-op ? Built from the ground up as a co-op experience, Star Trek packs two vastly different gameplay styles and unique character abilities into one game. The result: the most fully realized and varied co-op experience of this console generation.
Kirk and Spock Reborn - Play for the first time as two of the most well-known characters in science fiction, as only this new Star Trek game could allow. With the fate of the galaxy on the line, players must rely on each other to create a kick-ass team.
The Gorn Return - Determined to conquer the galaxy, the Gorn returns as re-imagined versions of the classic Trek villains, infecting their foes with venom that can poison, cause hallucinations, and even kill. Ranging in size and abilities, the Gorn seed mayhem and destruction as they destroy populations and deplete planets of their resources.

game.name: Stardrone
game.desc: StarDrone Extreme is a skill game available on PlaySation Network. Guide a metallic sphere through various challenging levels and collect as many artifacts as possible. Make sure you take the right trajectories if you don't want to end up in the scenery.

game.name: Starhawk
game.desc: Starhawk on Playstation 3 is a multiplayer action game. On the ground, in vehicles or in the air, take part in epic battles during which you can build buildings to develop your offensive or defensive abilities. A single-player campaign is also offered to familiarise you with the different aspects of the gameplay.

game.path: ./Stealth Inc - A Clone in the Dark.m3u
game.name: Stealth Inc : A Clone in the Dark
game.desc: Stealth Inc: A Clone in the Dark is a platformer and infiltration game on PS3. You play as a spy who must find the exit of a succession of levels. To do this, he must sneak into the shadows and thwart the vigilance of an army of robots and surveillance cameras.
game.marquee: ./images/Stealth Inc - A Clone in the Dark-marquee.png

game.name: Stick It To The Man!
game.desc: The PS3 adventure / platform game Stick It to The Man! introduces us to Ray. One day, he finds himself with a sort of spiritual arm that comes out of his head. Thanks to the arm, Ray can read the thoughts of those around him, but also grab elements of the environment and place them elsewhere. However, this power also means that Ray is wanted by a disturbing group.

game.name: Streets Of Rage 2
game.desc: A year after defeating Mr. X, cops Axel, Blaze and Adam are back to their normal lives, until he's kidnapped. This is the starting point for Streets of Rage 2 on the Playstation Store. The game remains a classic beat'em all, but is greatly enriched in terms of gameplay compared to its predecessor, as well as the interactivity of the environments.

game.name: Strider
game.desc: Strider is an action/platform game for PlayStation 3. Set in 2048, you play as Hiryu aka "Strider", an agile ninja capable of grabbing onto anything in the world who will infiltrate the cyberpunk city of Kazakh to dethrone its tyrant. Prepare to suffer in this very high difficulty title.

game.name: Super Hang-on
game.desc: Grab your bike and take on the roads of the world, completing tracks in the allotted time. Each continent has a different difficulty level and the competitors are all obstacles to avoid on the road.

game.name: Super Motherload
game.desc: On Mars in the near future. A rare and valuable mineral has been discovered, and the player must mine, alone or with friends, deep into the planet.

game.name: Super Puzzle Fighter II Turbo HD Remix
game.desc: Pieces fall off the screen and you have to make them disappear by matching them by colour, each disappearance leading to a fight between two small characters in the centre of the game. The more pieces you make disappear, the more your character hits the other. Be the fastest and sharpest to win the round.

game.name: Super Rub 'a' Dub
game.desc: Super Rub 'a' Dub on the Playstation Store lets you tilt and turn mazes in all directions to throw fearsome sharks overboard... And guide little ducks to the bungs where they'll be safe! The game features carefully designed levels, a variety of difficulty settings and a hilarious multiplayer option, as well as the ability to view online videos of players' performances from around the world.

game.name: Superstars V8 Racing
game.desc: Get back to four wheels and test your skills with V8 engines for the next racing challenge!Superstars V8 Racing is based on the license of the car racing Italian Championship. Powered by some of the most important car manufacturers in the whole world - such as BMW, Audi and Jaguar - and sporting top class production cars it delivers a breathtaking driving experience. Superstars V8 Racing offers the most realistic impression of the Championship. From car design to technical engine features, from the setting of the races to the turns of the tracks, everything has been designed in great detail. Every single car behaves in a completely different way accordingly to its real technical features and the settings tuned by each team competing for the title in order to get the best performance out of the powerful engine.

game.name: Super Street Fighter II HD Remix
Superfrog Hd
game.desc: The game is about a prince who is turned into a frog by an evil witch, who has also kidnapped the princess. Luckily for him, the frog stumbles upon a can of energy drink and becomes Superfrog, determined to use his superpowers to rescue his princess and kiss her so that she in turn becomes a frog.

game.name: Supersonic Acrobatic Rocket-powered Battle-cars
game.desc: Supersonic Acrobatic Rocket-Powered Battle-Cars for Playstation 3 is a game that combines racing, football and battle. The player drives small vehicles that can fly away or use a boost at any time, the goal being to push a metal ball into what looks like a football cage. While it is possible to play alone or with 4 players in split screen, up to 8 players can compete in teams of 4 in different arenas.

game.name: Switchball
game.desc: Switchball on the PS3 shop is a puzzle-game in which you take control of a ball in order to escape from tunnels, each one more twisted than the next. The originality of this game consists in the fact that you must alternate between the different states of the ball in order to avoid the numerous obstacles in your path.

game.name: Swords & Soldiers
game.desc: Swords & Soldiers on PSN is a real-time strategy game with a side view and horizontal scrolling. The game features three factions with specific units and powers. Three campaigns are available in single player mode, with a split screen multiplayer mode also included.

game.name: Syberia
game.desc: Syberia on PS3 is a point and click game about a New York lawyer, Kate Walker, who is sent to Europe by her law firm to buy an automaton factory following the death of its owner. However, an heir is still alive but cannot be found. Set out to find him on a unique journey that takes you to the farthest reaches of Siberia and takes you through atypical landscapes, for an adventure that is just as unusual.

game.name: Tales from Space : About a Blob
game.desc: Tales from Space: About a Blob is a game available for download on PS3. This title combines platforming and puzzle. You play as a gelatinous alien who is trying to escape from the scientists who captured him. He gradually grows by swallowing all the elements in his environment, which allows him to defend himself effectively against the humans who have mistreated him.

game.name: Tales From The Borderlands
game.desc: Set on the unforgiving world of Pandora after the events seen in Borderlands 2, this is a story full of Borderlands™ trademark humor, following two adventurers on their quest for greatness. You'll play as Rhys, a Hyperion suit™ with dreams of being the next Handsome Jack, and Fiona, a Pandoran con artist looking to score her biggest ever swindle. Thrown together as unwilling partners in an adventure to recover cash they both think is theirs, their journey will take you on a wild ride where gangsters, bandit lords, and Vault Hunters are just some of the obstacles you'll encounter, in this new take on the award-winning universe created by Gearbox Software.

game.name: Tales Of Graces F
game.desc: Tales of Graces f is a role-playing game for Playstation 3 that is an improved version of the Wii episode. In addition to redesigned graphics, the game features various additions as well as an additional storyline that tells the fate of the main characters in the story. The player takes on the role of Asbel Lhant, an 18 year old young man who finds himself involved in a conflict between three rival countries.

game.path: ./Tales of Symphonia Dawn of the New World.m3u
game.name: Tales of Symphonia : Dawn of the New World
game.desc: Tales of Symphonia: Dawn of the New World on PS3 is an extension of the original episode. This role-playing game takes place two years after the journey of Lloyd and his companions, characters who will also travel with us in this new opus. The two new heroes, Emil and Marta, will try to understand what is behind Lloyd's destructive actions.
game.marquee: ./images/Tales of Symphonia Dawn of the New World-marquee.png
game.thumbnail: ./images/Tales of Symphonia Dawn of the New World-thumb.png
game.fanart: ./images/Tales of Symphonia Dawn of the New World-fanart.jpg
game.boxback: ./images/Tales of Symphonia Dawn of the New World-boxback.png

game.name: Tales Of Symphonia
game.desc: Tales of Symphonia is a role-playing game available on PS3. The player embodies Lloyd Irving. With the help of Genis Sage and Colette Brunel, he must save the world in a struggle between good and evil. More than 80 hours of gameplay awaits you, alone or with others, in an exciting story.

game.name: Tales Of Xillia 2
game.desc: Tales of Xillia 2 is a role-playing game for PS3. Ludger Kresnik meets many characters from the first part in new adventures. He has to find his missing brother who is accused of an attack that caused almost two thousand deaths.

game.name: Tales Of Xillia
game.desc: Tales of Xillia is an RPG for PS3. It is the first in the series to offer two different points of view on the story with two characters to choose from at the beginning of the game. As the incarnation of Maxwell, the lord of the spirits, Milla will have to rely on Jude's help to regain her powers and neutralise a destructive weapon. The combat system allows you to establish links between characters for even more dynamic and tactical confrontations.

game.name: Tales Of Zestiria
game.desc: Tales of Zestiria is a role-playing game for PS3. The player follows the story of Sorey, an aspiring monk who can communicate with the Seraphim and who wishes to restore peace and order on the continent of Glenwood. Two countries are constantly fighting each other: the kingdom of Hyland and the empire of Rolance.

game.name: Tank Battles
game.desc: Tank Battles is an action-strategy game available for download on the Playstation Store. You take control of a tank and must reduce your enemies to dust in various game boards dotted with obstacles. One stick on the controller controls your vehicle while the second allows you to open fire. The software offers a campaign mode and an online multiplayer mode.

game.name: Tecmo Bowl Throwback
game.desc: Tecmo Bowl Throwback is an American football game available for download on the PS3 Playstation Store. It is a remake of the classic Tecmo Super Bowl released in 1993 on Super Nintendo. An old-school mode is offered as well as a current mode with 3D graphics. 32 teams are grouped together to play alone or online.

game.path: ./Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles - Danger of the Ooze.m3u
game.name: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles : Danger of the Ooze
game.desc: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Danger of the Ooze is a 2.5D platform video game developed by WayForward Technologies and published by Activision . It is the second video game based on the 2012 Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles TV series and features elements from the show's second and third seasons. It was released as a sequel to the 2013 game Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles. The game also features gameplay elements and homages to the 1989 Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles NES game.
game.thumbnail: ./images/Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles - Danger of the Ooze-thumb.png
game.boxback: ./images/Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles - Danger of the Ooze-boxback.png

game.name: Tekken 5 : Dark Resurrection Online
game.desc: Tekken 5: Dark Resurrection Online on PS3 features classic modes such as Arcade and Duel, as well as the all-new Training mode where you can hone your skills to meet the challenge of Survival mode. You'll also be able to pull off devastating moves against real opponents in the new Online Battle mode available for the first time in Tekken history.

game.name: Tekken Revolution
game.desc: Tekken Revolution is a free downloadable fighting game for PS3. You play as a Tekken character and compete against other players online.

game.name: Terraria
game.desc: The world is yours. Fight for your survival, explore for your fortune and dig for your glory. Explore the underground, test your combat skills or build your own city! Terraria is a 2D exploration and crafting platform game. Players can collect a variety of items from the world, including wood, ore and even spider webs. Resources acquired from the environment can be turned into all sorts of items. The first priority is to establish a base before nightfall to protect yourself from zombies and eye monsters. There are many items you can make for your home, including doors, walls, tables, chairs and beds. During the day, slimes roam and must be avoided or eliminated with a weapon such as a sword or axe which you can upgrade with the materials you collect.

game.name: Terrover
game.desc: TerRover, on the Playstation 3 PSN, requires you to drive a small vehicle to the exit of each level. Of course, it's not as easy as it sounds and there are many traps in your way, forcing you to use the laws of physics to get through. A few weapons are also available.

game.name: Teslagrad
game.desc: Teslagrad is a 2D puzzle platformer with action elements, where magnetism and other electromagnetic powers are the key to go throughout the game, and thereby discover the secrets kept in the long abandoned Tesla Tower. Gain new abilities to explore a non-linear world with more than 100 beautiful hand-drawn environments, in a steampunk-inspired vision of old Europe. You play as a young boy who suddenly finds himself embroiled in a long-forgotten conspiracy, involving the despotic king who has ruled the nation with an iron fist for several years. Jump into an outstanding adventure told through voiceless storytelling, writing your own part. Armed with ancient Teslamancer technology and your own ingenuity and creativity, your path lies through the decrepit Tesla Tower and beyond.

game.name: Test Yourself
game.desc: The aim of Test Yourself for download on PS3 is to provide users with a professional assessment of various aspects of their personality and psychological abilities.

game.name: Texas Cheat'em
game.desc: Texas Cheat'em on PS3 is a game that proposes to play poker following the rules of Texas Hold'em but in crazy games where it will be possible to cheat. Indeed, the title provides you with a whole panel of gadgets or ways to have a psychological advantage over the opponent: stealing chips, swapping cards or x-ray vision are just a sample of the deceitful actions you can perform.

game.name: The Smurfs 2
game.desc: The Smurfs 2 is an Action-Adventure Platformer game that follows the thrilling story of the second movie of the Smurfs that takes place in New York and Paris. Players will take control of their favorite blue heroes to succeed on their quest to rescue Smurfette from the evil Gargamel.

game.name: The Swapper
game.desc: The Swapper on PlayStation 3 is a puzzle-platformer offering the player a unique adventure in a space universe. In addition to a very high quality atmosphere, the game offers a series of puzzles based on the use of the hero's cannon, used here to duplicate the character so that he can activate several mechanisms at the same time.

game.name: The Swindle
game.desc: The Swindle is a steampunk platformer for PlayStation 3. As a resourceful thief, the player must infiltrate numerous buildings and choose between the easy way or the hard way to steal valuable loot. The player can then invest their winnings in better equipment or a variety of skills.

game.name: The UnderGarden
game.desc: The UnderGarden on Playstation 3 is a platformer and puzzle game where the player embodies an aquatic creature. His objective is to re-flower the sea bed by collecting and sowing pollen. Obstacles and puzzles regularly hinder his progress. The game offers fifteen levels and a two-player cooperation mode.

game.name: The Unfinished Swan
game.desc: The Unfinished Swan is an art game for PS3. You play as a young boy lost in the dream of a king who has decided to "repaint" his kingdom in white. You will have to use coloured marbles to make the scenery appear to reach the last chapters of the monarch's dream in order to understand him and escape at the same time.

game.name: The Witch and the Hundred Knight
game.desc: The Witch and the Hundred Knight is an action-RPG for PS3. As a microbe destined to become the legendary demon Hundred Knight, you must help the swamp witch expand her territory and defeat the wood witch. There are a number of gameplay constraints that require you to return to explore levels multiple times to complete them, with your weapons and powers changing considerably throughout the game.

game.name: Thomas Was Alone
game.desc: Thomas Was Alone is a platform and puzzle game available for download. You play as AIs that take the form of colored rectangles each with different properties: one jumps higher while another can float in water and a third is able to bounce its comrades. You need to combine these different abilities to complete a hundred levels.

game.name: Thunder Wolves
game.desc: When this 'wolf pack' strikes, you hear the thunder roll. The Thunder Wolves attack from the air. They are mercenaries, and the best helicopter pilots in the world. Every one of them is ready for action at all times and ready to fight evil, wherever it lurks. The Thunder Wolves have already made it through countless battles. They are equipped to destroy their enemies destruction is part of their business. Put yourself in the pilot's seat of a combat helicopter and become a member of the most experienced and dangerous helicopter team in the world! Support the Thunder Wolves in their global battle against terrorism. Take part in varied operations and do whatever it takes to thwart the diabolical plans of your enemies! Defeat them once and for all, and save the world!

game.name: Time And Eternity
game.desc: Kamza, a vibrant kingdom located on a lush ocean island, is in the midst of a national event celebrating the upcoming marriage of their princess to a valiant knight. But when a group of assassins appears during the ceremony, this dream come true transforms into their worst nightmare. As the knight lays mortally wounded, the princess reveals her longhidden secret - there is a second soul living within her, and together they control the power to travel through time. But can they act quickly enough to reverse the course of history and find out what happened that fateful day? Only time will tell...

game.name: Time Machine : Rogue Pilot
game.desc: Time Machine: Rogue Pilot offers a brand new approach to puzzle games genre taking the best from classic match 3 experience and combining it with the innovative hidden objects gameplay. Dozens of story mode missions that will fascinate you and can be played with a friend online or on the same screen! Plus the game also offers several bonus modes – all of this coming along with dazzling graphics, ambient background music and rich visual effects.

game.name: Tiny Brains
game.desc: Tiny Brains on PS3 takes up to four players into laboratory cages. Each player takes on the role of a lab animal with a special power, and it's vital to work with others to solve the puzzles that lie in wait.

game.name: Tiny Token Empires
game.desc: Tiny Token Empires is a subtle mix between a turn-based strategy game and a puzzle game on PS3. Players take on the role of one of the five nations competing around the Mediterranean: Romans, Greeks, Persians, Egyptians or Carthaginians. They will have to conquer new territories, build cities, create armies, and even face terrible Barbarians or monsters.

game.name: Tiny Troopers Joint Ops
game.desc: Tiny Troopers Joint Ops is an arcade shooter for PlayStation 3. Using both joysticks, lead your troops to victory by defeating your enemies on over 50 mini-maps while still being able to recruit more mercenaries.

game.name: Titan Attacks!
game.desc: Shoot'em up for PS3, Titan Attacks! puts the player in control of a tank. With Earth undergoing an alien invasion, he must shoot down the invaders and chase them to Titan, their home planet.

game.name: Tnt Racers
game.desc: TNT Racers is a racing and action game for Playstation 3. With 18 different tracks, and as many different cars, you can play with up to four players. Each vehicle has its own characteristics and attack.

game.path: ./ToeJam and Earl in Panic on Funkotron.m3u
game.name: ToeJam and Earl in Panic on Funkotron
Toki Tori
game.desc: Toki Tori on PS3 is a puzzle game with some elements borrowed from the platforming genre. Giving the game its title, Toki Tori is a young chicken who goes to the rescue of his brothers still in their eggs. To complete each level, the player must use the various objects introduced little by little to enable him to collect the eggs without getting stuck.

game.name: Tokyo Jungle
game.desc: Tokyo Jungle is an action role-playing title available for download on PS3. The aim of the game is to survive in a Tokyo city invaded by the jungle after the sudden disappearance of humans. Animals ranging from dogs to velociraptors can be unlocked and equipped to become real killing machines.

game.name: Tom Clancy's Endwar
game.desc: EndWar on PS3 is set against the backdrop of a hypothetical World War III. Using a voice command system, the player must lead one of three rival factions into battle and capture strategic points that provide access to tactical support weapons. Playable in single-player, EndWar places a strong emphasis on multiplayer, with an innovative mode that allows players to evolve frontlines on a global map until final victory is achieved.

game.name: Ghost Recon Advanced Warfighter 2
game.desc: Not even a day has fully passed since you rescued the US president from Mexican soil and you and the rest of your Ghost team are on the way home, when the General phones in and gives you your next mission: a group of terrorists deposited two dirty bombs (normal blasting compositions combined with radioactive material) near the city of Juarez. Your goal as Captain Mitchell is to once again save the day with your three teammates.nnnnLike in its predecessor Tom Clancy's Ghost Recon: Advanced Warfighter, you see Captain Mitchell from behind while you command your teammates directly over the Cross-Com to fulfil your objectives, like blowing up a bunch of anti-air vehicles and then raiding a rebel outpost. To do so, you have the normal Ghost team weaponry like the MR-C at your disposal, which you can equip you and your team with before and even at some points during the missions. You also have access to a tactical map which allows you to see an aerial view of the current level.

game.name: Tomb Raider Underworld
game.desc: The adventures of the explorer Lara Croft continue in this 8th episode on PS3 entitled Underworld. In this episode, the intrepid Lara will try to unravel the mysteries linked to the disappearance of her mother. Our globetrotter will have to recover Thor's hammer in order to face the demons of the past. This new action/platform game is more than ever a throwback to the original Tomb Raider. nn

game.name: Tomb Raider
game.desc: The young archaeologist Lara Croft is traveling on the ship Endurance together with a crew to locate the prehistoric Japanese kingdom of Yamatai and the secrets of the Sun Queen Himiko and her mystical powers. Against the group's advice, Lara presses on to go to the Dragon's Triangle, a location plagued by mysterious storms. When the ship is struck by one of the storms, everyone is stranded on a seemingly desolate island. Lara's task is to bring the crew back together and find out more about the island. She has to fight off the Solarii, a cult led by a mysterious person who has taken an interest in Lara's friend Samantha Nishimura.nnnnTomb Raider is the ninth game in the long-running series, serving as a complete reboot of the franchise and a prequel to it. Like the predecessors, it is an action-adventure game starring Lara Croft. Compared to previous entries, the gameplay has a number of differences.

game.name: Top Gun
game.desc: Top Gun on Playstation 3 is a new adaptation of the movie of the same title in the form of an action game. Offering multiple game modes in solo and multiplayer, it extends the storyline of the film and allows you to follow Maverick and the other characters from the academy to the combat zones.

game.name: Toy Story 3
game.desc: Toy Story 3 on Playstation 3 is a faithful action game adaptation of the movie's storyline in which Buzz, Woody and his friends must come to terms with their uncertain future as Andy prepares to enter college. The title features several game modes, including a co-op mode and a level editor. The title also offers mini-game downloads and Playstation Move compatibility.

game.name: Transformers : Devastation
game.desc: Transformers: Devastation is an action game similar to PlatinumGames' other titles (e.g. Bayonetta). Players control one of five Autobots: Optimus Prime, Bumblebee, Sideswipe, Wheeljack, and Grimlock, as they battle against Decepticons and Insecticons who stand in their way. Each of the Autobots are able to use a variety of melee attacks and ranged weapons, and are able to transform into vehicle mode at any time. Similar to Bayonetta, successfully dodging attacks activates Focus, which slows down time around the player, allowing them to counterattack their opponents. Each Autobot also has a unique special ability and a powerful Overdrive attack that can be performed with enough energy.

game.name: Ugly Americans : Apocalypsegeddon
game.desc: Ugly Americans: Apocalypsegeddon is a twin-stick shoot 'em up video game based on the Comedy Central television show Ugly Americans. It was developed by Backbone Entertainment and published by New 38th Floor Productions for the PlayStation 3 and by 345 Games and Comedy Central for the Xbox360. The game is set in the same world as the television show it is based on, an alternate version of New York City which is inhabited by humans as well as demons, zombies, bird-people and other fictional creatures. Players assume the role of one of four of the main characters from the show, the wizard Leonard, the police officer Grimes, the demon Callie, or Mark, as they fight through the city of New York in side-scrolling combat controlled primarily by the left and right thumb sticks. Ugly Americans: Apocalypsegeddon supports both co-op play and an online multiplayer mode.

game.name: Uncharted : Drake's Fortune
game.desc: A 400-year-old clue in the coffin of Sir Francis Drake sets a modern-day fortune hunter on an exploration for the fabled treasure of El Dorado, leading to the discovery of a forgotten island in the middle of the Pacific Ocean. The search turns deadly when Nathan Drake becomes stranded on the island and hunted by mercenaries. Outnumbered and outgunned, Drake and his companions must fight to survive as they begin to unravel the terrible secrets hidden on the Island. Taking full advantage of the power of PS3, Uncharted: Drake?s Fortune is developed using proprietary technology that promises to impress players with incredibly realistic characters and lifelike environments. Building on its legacy of extraordinary storytelling, developer Naughty Dog has created an elaborate plot that will have players guessing at every turn. Uncharted: Drake's Fortune, brings players into a world ripe with realism and unexpected juxtapositions.

game.name: Under Siege
game.desc: Under Siege is a real-time strategy game for Playstation 3. Only available for download on the PSN, the game unfolds in a universe that mixes hero-fantasy and futuristic machines. Through its campaign, you follow the struggle of Eirik, Kari and Asgeir against a vast invading army. In addition to a complete multiplayer mode (online and split screen), the software also offers a map editor in English allowing the most patient to create missions and share them online.

game.name: Vanquish
game.desc: Vanquish takes place in the near future where Earth's human population has grown so rapidly that nations are fighting for the scarce remaining resources. The United States of America has attempted to alleviate its energy problems by launching an O'Neill Cylinder space station harboring a solar energy-driven generator to provide them with an alternative source of energy. However, the government of the Russian Federation has been overthrown in a coup d'état by ultra-nationalist forces calling themselves the Order of the Russian Star.

game.name: Virtua Fighter 5 Final Showdown
game.desc: Virtua Fighter 5 Final Showdown is a fighting game for the Playstation 3. It is actually an improved version of Virtua Fighter 5 with a complete overhaul of the game mechanics, new animations, rebalancing, new arenas and two additional characters as well as bonus game modes.

game.name: Voltron : Defender of the Universe
game.desc: Voltron: Defender of the Universe is a downloadable shooter for Playstation 3. Controlling the 5 famous mechanical lions from the animated series, the player must destroy his enemies on land and in space. At the end of each chapter, he also controls the famous super robot Golion in a turn-based duel. An online multiplayer mode is available for multiplayer fun.

game.name: Voodoo Dice
game.desc: Voodoo Dice on Playstation 3 is the 3D adaptation of the original puzzle game. The objective is to manipulate a die through several levels while solving puzzles and riddles as quickly as possible.

game.name: Wakeboarding Hd
game.desc: Wakeboarding HD is a game of... wakeboarding on Playstation 3! A bit crazy, the software offers you to ride on the most beautiful seas and oceans of the world, to jump over trees, submarines and even helicopters!

game.name: Wanted Corp.
game.desc: Wanted Corp. for Playstation 3 is an action game in which two characters team up to beat up the bad guys. While Neal H. MadDogg never takes his weapons off, his partner Irina Zimoy prefers to use her psychic powers. The game offers a cooperative mode in addition to its single player mode.

game.name: Warhawk
game.desc: WarHawk is an action and simulation game for Playstation 3. Exclusively playable online, up to 32 pilots at the same time, the title puts you in the cockpit of fighter planes, at the controls of Jeeps or even at the head of defensive turrets, in the different game modes of the title (Capture The Flag, Deathmatch in team or solo, or in the variant of the Domination mode)

game.name: Warlords
game.desc: Warlords is a remake of the original action game released on Atari 2600. The title available on the PlayStation Network still has the objective of defending your castle and attacking the enemy's. A local and online multiplayer mode allows up to 4 players to enjoy the experience.

game.name: Warriors Orochi 3 Ultimate
game.desc: Set in a parallel universe created by the suddenly appearing Serpent King Orochi, players can enjoy the refreshing action of mighty warriors in the tactical action game series WARRIORS OROCHI. The series is full of unique components such as an original story with heroes from the Dynasty Warriors and Samurai Warriors series and a three-man team battle mode. Players can fully enjoy the dramatic story WARRIORS OROCHI 3's many heroes even more with new characters who can participate in battle and additional scenarios. Additionally, many new components, such as new actions, and a new 'Gauntlet Mode,' in which players can enjoy a party battle have been added, making this truly the ultimate WARRIORS OROCHI 3.

game.name: Warriors Orochi 3
game.desc: Warriors Orochi 3 is a mass beat'em all on Playstation 3. Gathering heroes from the different Warriors series but also from Ninja Gaiden or Dead or Alive, this episode proposes us to relive the battles of the past to save up to 120 characters and face a terrible giant hydra. A level editor is also available to create your own stories.

game.name: Watch Dogs
game.desc: The storyline of Watch Dogs game is built around the concept of information warfare, data being interconnected, and the world's increasing use of technology?questioning who exactly runs the computers they depend on. The game is set in an alternate reality version of Chicago, Illinois, which is one of many cities to feature a supercomputer known as a "CtOS" (Central Operating System). The system controls almost every piece of technology in the city, and contains information on all of the city's residents and activities which can be used for various purposes. In the game's universe, the Northeast blackout of 2003 was found to be caused by a hacker, prompting the development of CtOS. The game will follow a man named Aiden Pearce, a highly skilled hacker described as a person who uses both "fists and wits." The gameplay demo shown at E3 2012 depicted Aiden's attempt to assassinate a media mogul named Joseph DeMarco, who had been wrongly acquitted on charges of murder. In a demonstration shown at E3 2013, Pearce helps a fellow hacker named T-Bone escape after he is discovered attempting to steal a motherboard.

game.name: Watchmen - The End is nigh EP1
Watchmen - The End is nigh EP2
Way Of The Samurai 4
game.desc: Way of the Samurai 4 on PS3 is an action/adventure game in which you truly decide the fate of your character, a masterless samurai. The story takes place in the heart of feudal Japan and has multiple ramifications depending on the path you decide to follow. The game has many different endings.

game.name: Wheel Of Fortune
game.desc: Wheel of Fortune is a game inspired by the TV game show of the same name. The principle is simple: three contestants, words to discover and of course a wheel. Each contestant spins the wheel and has to suggest a consonant they think is in the word. Little by little, the word is revealed and the one who finds it wins. But beware of "bankruptcy"!

game.name: When Vikings Attack!
game.desc: When Vikings Attack! is an action-adventure game for Playstation 3. At the head of a troop of Vikings immersed in the contemporary world, the player must face many dangers using medieval weapons. It is possible to follow a complete scenario in solo or to fight other players on the same platform as on Playstation Vita.
