game.name: Who Wants To Be A Millionaire
Wizardry : Labyrinth of Lost Souls
game.desc: Wizardry: Labyrinth of Lost Souls is a role-playing game available only on the Playstation Store for the Playstation 3. Released in Japan two years ago, Wizardry does us the honour of arriving in our distant homeland. Be careful though: you're dealing with an old-fashioned role-playing game, which means that the challenge is tough, even bordering on the masochistic. You have been warned!

game.name: Wolf of the Battlefield : Commando 3
game.desc: Wolf of the Battlefield: Commando 3 on the Playstation Store is an action game with an aerial view where the player takes on the role of one of three available mercenaries, each with their own characteristics. In multiplayer the difficulty increases according to the number of soldiers in the game.

game.name: Wolfenstein 3d
game.desc: Wolfenstein 3D is a first-person shooter available for download from the Playstation Store. The player must find his way through a Nazi castle and get rid of all his enemies. It is possible to recover lives as the game progresses as well as new weapons and other bonuses.

game.name: Wonder Boy In Monster Land
game.desc: Eleven years have gone by since Tom-Tom rescued his girlfriend Tanya from the clutches of the evil King. Word of Tom-Tom's dangerous adventure soon spread throughout Wonder Land. The people were very proud of him and gave Tom-Tom the highest honor of all - the legendary name of Wonder Boy. With the evil King defeated, Wonder Land returned to its peaceful state, and for over one decade, the kingdom was a paradise, and everything and everyone lived happily together. Eventually, the peace was broken when a ferocious fire-breathing dragon appeared out of nowhere and took over Wonder Land with an army of evil, monsterous henchmen, causing Wonder Land was immediately thrown into utter chaos. The people were quickly taken over and the tranquil and serene kingdom was transformed into a land of demons and devils. Wonder Land was now a Monster Land. Tom-Tom was summoned to set out on a journey, destroy this dragon, and restore peace once again. Tom-Tom is Wonder Land's last hope.

game.name: Wonder Boy In Monster World
game.desc:
Monster World was once a peaceful region. Then, the peace was shattered by an invading army of monsters. A young man named Shion vowed to defeat them and make his land peaceful again.
Wonder Boy In Monster World is the third game in the Monster World spin-off series, originally known as Wonder Boy 5: Monster World 3. It puts the player in control of Shion in his quest to save Monster World from the evil hands of BioMeka. It controls like a standard platform game - run, jump, and kill enemies. The game has light RPG elements such as talking to townsfolk, collecting money to buy items, upgrading your life, and equipping a variety of armor and weapons - staying very close to the Zelda format. You can save your game to continue your quest at a later time.

game.name: World Gone Sour
game.desc: World Gone Sour, on the Playstation Network, follows the journey of a sour candy to the stomach of a human. Many dangers stand in its way, but the candy can count on the help of other sweets to advance in levels mixing platforms and reflection.

game.name: Worms 2 : Armageddon
game.desc: Worms 2: Armageddon is the latest turn-based-strategy blast-a-thon to come to the PlayStation 3 computer entertainment system, and is packed with features set to satisfy both new and older generation of Worms players alike. With fresh visuals, hilarious new weaponry as well as returning iconic favorites, this online and offline destruction-fest is set to grab players across the globe with its unique brand of easy to learn, but hard to master gameplay.

game.name: Worms Crazy Golf
game.desc: Worms Crazy Golf is a brazenly bonkers mixture of classic 2D Worms and hilarious eighteen-hole hijinks. Spread across a variety of weird and wonderful courses and featuring some mind-bendingly mental power-ups, this is the craziest golf you'll ever play. With many fan-favorite features from the Worms universe such as the sheep, old woman, mole, magnets, mines and crazy chain reactions making an appearance, it is anything but a straight simulation. Set across three surreal 18-hole golf courses plus a diverse range of skill-based challenge modes, expect to be challenged by increasingly puzzling hole design and an array of obstacles; from castles that teleport your ball, cannons that shoot it across the landscape and even obstructive comedy bats! Only skillful shot execution and clever use of special powers such as the parachute ball, or the ability to slow time down will see you hit par and progress to the next hole.

game.name: XCOM : Enemy Unknown
game.desc: XCOM : Enemy Unknown sur PS3 est un jeu qui combine tactique, gestion et stratégie dans une guerre secrète contre des envahisseurs extraterrestres. Le jeu vous place à la tête d'une organisation spéciale mandatée pour protéger la Terre. Vous devez gérer votre base, développer des technologies et entraîner vos troupes pour des batailles au tour par tour dans des décors variés. Le jeu propose également un mode multijoueur compétitif pour deux joueurs.

game.name: Yakuza 4
game.desc: Yakuza 4 is a video game developed and released by Sega for the PlayStation 3. The game was introduced on July 24, 2009. A promotional video was presented at the 2009 Tokyo Game Show, and a preview of the main plot was released on January 13, 2010. The sequel to Yakuza 3, it was released on March 18, 2010 in Japan after a playable demo was released on the Japanese PlayStation Store on March 5. Yakuza 4 was released in Europe and North America in March 2011. The game received an Award for Excellence at the 2010 Japan Game Awards, and received a score of 38 out of 40 from Famitsu. It has a 79-percent rating on GameRankings based on 40 reviews and a valuation of 78 out of 100 on Metacritic, based on 59 reviews.

game.name: Young Justice : Legacy
game.desc: In Young Justice: Legacy fans can look forward to an original storyline set in between Seasons 1 and 2 of the television series, written in collaboration with show writers Greg Weisman and Brandon Vietti. The game is packed with fan favorite playable characters, cameo appearances by popular Justice League heroes and villains, and includes online multiplayer as well as local multiplayer modes.

game.name: Yu-gi-oh! Millennium Duels
game.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh! Millennium Duels is a card game in the Yu-Gi-Oh! universe for PS3. The title offers the possibility to play one of the 20 characters available from the Yu-Gi-Oh! saga. The game features online functionality that allows players from all over the world to compete in fierce duels.

game.name: Zack Zero
game.desc: Zack Zero is a platformer and action game available for download on PS3. It features the famous Zack, who is on a quest to find his beloved, who has been kidnapped by warlike aliens. He has a suit that allows him to use earth, ice and fire powers to get rid of the enemies in the levels.

game.name: Zen Pinball
game.desc: Zen Pinball is a pinball game to download from Playstation Store. Delivered with 4 first tables, the game can also be enhanced with some additional tables to download. Several game modes allow you to race for high scores with of course the possibility of playing with others online or locally.

game.name: Zeno Clash II
game.desc: Sequel to the completely crazy Zeno Clash, the first person shooter, Zeno Clash II on PS3 offers more open environments than its elder brother, a more diversified gameplay and role playing elements have been integrated. Finally, the fights have been made even more gory!

game.name: Zombie Apocalypse : Never Die Alone
game.desc: Zombie Apocalypse: Never Die Alone is a Playstation 3 Playstation Store downloadable action game that follows on from Zombie Apocalypse. Four new heroes must try to survive a zombie invasion in fast-paced, aerial-view action that relies heavily on cooperation.

game.name: Zombie Apocalypse
game.desc: Zombie Apocalypse to download on the Playstation Store is an action game allowing four players to face countless zombies in 7 different environments. An array of 11 weapons is available for the massacre. Several game modes are to be unlocked.

game.name: Zombie Driver Hd
game.desc: Zombie Driver HD is an action game available for download on Playstation 3. The player takes on the role of a driver who must pick up survivors from a city infested with the undead. There are 17 missions to complete in a variety of vehicles, which can be upgraded and equipped with weapons such as a machine gun and flamethrower.

game.name: Zone Of The Enders HD Edition
Zuma's Revenge!
game.desc: Zuma's Revenge on PS3 is the sequel to Zuma Deluxe. The principle of this puzzle game remains unchanged: destroy the coloured balls by accumulating them to prevent them from reaching the exit. The game has dozens of levels and several difficulty modes.

game.name: Pier Solar and the Great Architects

game.path: ./Phineas and Ferb Across The Second Dimension.m3u
game.name: Phineas and Ferb Across The Second Dimension

game.path: ./Zone Of The Enders - The 2nd Runner HD Edition.m3u
game.name: Zone Of The Enders - The 2nd Runner HD Edition
Naughty Bear
game.desc: Naughty Bear is a very special action/adventure game for Playstation 3. Taking place in a dreamlike world populated by charming teddy bears, the player embodies Naughty Bear, an outcast rejected by his fellow bears. Your objective: to take revenge on your fellow citizens by terrorising them or even killing them in a particularly cruel manner. You will also have to triumph over the bosses in each of the seven worlds of the game.

game.name: Naruto Shippuden : Ultimate Ninja Storm Revolution
game.desc:
Naruto Shippuden: Ultimate Ninja Storm Revolution is an entry in the Naruto: Ultimate Ninja fighting game series developed by CyberConnect2, based on the Naruto manga by Masashi Kishimoto.
Players can unlock a total of 118 playable characters, which includes characters from previous games as well as new models. The core of the singleplayer component consists of the tournament mode, in which players have to fight their way to the top in a ninja tournament held on an island. Exclusive to the singleplayer mode, players can fight against up to three characters at the same time. Battle arenas are equipped with new features like railriding.

game.name: Natural Doctrine
game.desc: Natural Doctrine is a tactical RPG for PlayStation 3. The player follows the adventures of Geoff, Vasily and Anka in a fantasy world populated by monsters. It can be played solo or in multiplayer co-op.

game.name: Starlight Inception
game.desc: Starlight Inception is a space combat game available on PlayStation 3. In the 2030s, a young pilot must fight his way through the solar system because of World War IV.

game.name: Ufc Undisputed 3
game.desc: UFC Undisputed 3 is an MMA simulation for Playstation 3. More accessible than in the past, the software allows us to participate in various types of matches, to follow a long career or to organise tournaments. The Ultimate mode has been redesigned and the now defunct Pride league is included this year to vary the pleasures.

game.path: ./Ni No Kuni - Wrath of the White Witch - Part 2 (Install both parts separately).m3u
game.name: Ni No Kuni - Wrath of the White Witch - Part 2 (Install both parts separately)
Sly Cooper and the Thievius Raccoounus
Arcana Heart 3
game.desc: In Arcana Heart 3, chaos is erupting in Japan. Planar rifts are appearing in various locations around the country and it is suspected that the Drexler Institute, a player in the Great War many years ago and creator of the Divine Celestial Weapon, is involved. There is a rumor circulating that if one gets their hands on a celestial stone from a rift, their wishes will be granted. Their power draws many young women to search for them, either to seal them away or in hopes that the rumors are true. Each has their own reasons for the hunt, and they won't allow anyone stand in their way, enemy...or friend alike.

game.name: Blazing Angels 2 : Secret Missions of WW II
game.desc: Blazing Angels 2 is the sequel to Squadrons of WWII. Players take on the role of young pilots assigned to a secret squadron. They will have to carry out missions of the utmost importance around the globe, with the ultimate goal of preventing the Nazis from creating a weapon of mass destruction.

game.name: Brain Challenge
game.desc: Get your brain in shape with these fun daily exercises! No pain, stress, or boredom; just challenging and entertaining puzzles that act like a vitamin boost for your brain. Twenty different games in five categories (Memory, Visual, Logic, Math, and Focus) will train all areas of your brain. Evaluate your mental capacity under regular or stressful conditions with the Daily Test & the Stress Management Test, and work with your favorite personal coach among two to improve. Keep track of your progress every day, and easily evaluate your level of brain activity.

game.name: Carnival Island
game.desc: Experience the joy of classic family-friendly fun in more than 35 carnival games and attractions. Using the PlayStation Move motion controller's precise tracking technology, every toss, roll, throw, spin, and slam is translated directly into the game for extremely accurate and responsive gameplay. Whether you're 5 or 65, family game night just got a lot more fun!

game.name: Cars 2
game.desc: From the makers of Toy Story 3: The Video Game comes Cars 2: The Video Game, where players can jump into the Cars 2 universe with some of their favorite Cars personalities in locations around the globe. Train to become an agent of C.H.R.O.M.E (Command Headquarters for Recon Operations & Motorized Espionage) and take on dangerous missions, compete to become the fastest racecar in the world, or use your spy skills in exciting, action-packed combat racing!

game.name: Catherine
game.desc: Vincent likes his girlfriend. Katherine's pretty, smart, and successful. Trouble is, she's starting to talk about long-term commitment, something Vincent's spent his entire life avoiding. Since romantic complications are the last thing he wants to deal with, Vincent meets his friends for their regular night of drinks. Little does he know that he's about to be blindsided by a beautiful, seductive, irresistible freight train named Catherine. Suddenly, he's hung over in bed next to the most beautiful woman he's ever seen, unsure about the previous night's events. Was it just making out, he wonders, or did something more serious happen between them? Should he tell Katherine? Will he ever see Catherine again? Vincent's about to find that a stumble on the staircase of love can turn into a horrific, fatal plummet...

game.name: Chariot
game.desc: An action-adventure game for PS3, Chariot is based on physics and balance. The player must lead his two characters as they drag their deceased king through dark and dangerous cellars to find a tomb for him and collect treasure.

game.name: Dirt 3
game.desc: DiRT 3 is a racing game for PS3. Get behind the wheel of one of the sixty vehicles available, including the Mini Cooper S1275 or the Lancia Stratos HF Integrale, and take part in one of the 6 game modes in single or split screen mode. Online multiplayer is also available, and new modes such as Gymkhana have been introduced.

game.name: Dirt Showdown
game.desc: DiRT Showdown is an action-oriented racing game for PS3. The player who loves crumpled metal can practice gymkhana but also more violent events where each player must destroy the vehicles of his opponents. Finally, rallycross races complete the picture.

game.name: Disney Universe
game.desc: Disney Universe is an action/adventure game for Playstation 3. Playable with 4 players in cooperation, the software allows you to evolve in different Disney universes such as Alice in Wonderland or Monsters & Co. The title offers the player more than 40 costumes inspired by the company's famous characters, each with specific abilities.

game.name: Dynasty Warriors 7 Empires
game.desc: Dynasty Warriors 7 Empires is a Beat-'Em-Up game, developed by Omega Force and published by TECMO KOEI GAMES CO., LTD., which was released in 2013.

game.name: Dynasty Warriors 8 Empires Free Alliances Version
Dynasty Warriors 8 : Empires
game.desc: Dynasty Warriors 8: Empires is a beat'em all combat and adventure game with management and strategy elements. You follow the destiny of a Chinese general who is trying to unify the country. To do this, he must manage the recruitment of his army, the organisation of his council, but also participate in battles and eliminate thousands of his enemies.

game.name: Ea Sports Mma
game.desc: EA SPORTS MMA brings the authenticity of the world's most intense combat sport home like never before. Choose from the world's top fighters or climb the ranks of the worldwide circuit with your created prodigy to become the ultimate MMA champion. Travel the globe and learn a multitude of fighting techniques and skills from masters in each discipline. Select from various weight classes, rule sets, and take on all challengers in multiple cage types or a ring. The challenge continues online with the most robust offering for any MMA videogame, including the ability to create and share custom fighters, prize fights, and more. Are you ready? Let's get it on!

game.name: Epic Mickey 2 - The Power of Two
Family Guy : Back to the Multiverse
game.desc: Family Guy: Back to the Multiverse is a third-person cooperative gameplay video game set to be released on November 20, 2012 in North America for Xbox 360, PlayStation 3 and PC. It's based on the Family Guy television series, most notably the episode Road to the Multiverse, and is also a continuation of The Big Bang Theory. It is rated M for Mature for blood, violence, drug use, mature humor, and sexual content/themes. This game also features the return of Stewie's evil half-brother Bertram, who was killed in the show.

game.name: Fast and Furious : Showdown
game.desc: Fast and Furious : Showdown is an action-oriented racing game for PS3. You will play as several characters who will have the joy of driving various vehicles ranging from race cars to armoured tanks and hovercrafts. Alone or with a friend, you will have several missions to complete.

game.path: ./Hot Shots Golf - Out of Bounds Complete Collection.m3u
game.name: Hot Shots Golf - Out of Bounds Complete Collection
Hot Wheels World's Best Driver
game.desc: Hot Wheels World?s Best Driver lets players get behind the wheel of thrilling Hot Wheels vehicles while joining the elite ranks of Team Hot Wheels. Gameplay includes competition in dozens of unique, fast-paced, re-playable challenges all highlighting the different driving styles of Team Hot Wheels: the speed record-breaking Green Team, the show-stopping stunts of the Red Team, the high-tech precision of the Blue Team and the world record-breaking jumps of the Yellow Team. The game pushes players to their limits to see if they have what it takes to become the World?s Best Driver.

game.name: Injustice : Gods Among Us
game.desc: Injustice: Gods Among Us is a fighting game from the creators of the Mortal Kombat series with characters of the DC universe. The gameplay consists in a hand-to-hand fighting in a 2D gameplay with 3D elements and characters with some weapons like the Batmobile; some scenarios are taken from DC comics like the Fortress of Solitude (Superman), the Batcave (Batman) and the Watchtower (Justice League); and 28 characters (12 heroes, 12 villains and 4 downloadable) are available in this game.

game.name: Jetpack Joyride
game.desc: Barry Steakfries, an entrepreneur, sees his sales drop considerably. On the verge of bankruptcy, he sees only one solution: ask a secret laboratory if he can create something to boost his profits. When he goes to the lab, he finds a secret creation: a jetpack. Thinking of all the things he could do with it, he storms into the lab, breaks through a wall, steals the jetpack and runs away.The aim of the game is to travel the longest distance on his jetpack, avoiding zappers, missiles and lasers, and collecting as many coins and draw tokens as possible. There are also missions to complete, to level up, and earn money to spend in the shop.

game.name: Lego Marvel Super Heroes
game.desc: Lego Marvel Super Heroes is an action game, reuniting about one hundred and a half Marvel heroes and villains coming from several Marvel franchises, having the player control the good ones in order to save the Earth from a team of the vicious (headed by Galactus, also named as The Devourer of the Worlds); all in the fashion of LEGO adventures blocky cartoonish visual style and gameplay.

game.name: LEGO The Hobbit
game.desc: The interactive game of LEGO The Hobbit allows gamers to play along with their favorite scenes from the films, and follows the Hobbit Bilbo Baggins as he is recruited by the Wizard Gandalf to aid Thorin Oakenshield and his Company of Dwarves.

game.name: Lego Jurassic World
game.desc: LEGO Jurassic World is an action game based on the four Jurassic Park movies and released alongside the 2015 movie Jurassic World. As with many other Tt Games titles it adapts a licensed franchise to a world built up out of LEGO bricks. The game consists of 20 levels, five for each of the movies, played in succession. The game borrows many iconic moments from the films using the original audio clips and often adds a humorous twist.

game.name: Littlebigplanet 2
game.desc:
A PLATFORM GAME A PLATFORM FOR GAMES
A powerful new set of tools awaits you, tools that vastly widen the scope of possibility, and that hand you the power to create whole games.
Through a familiar but revamped Popit, you can bring your characters to life, compose your own music, direct cinematic masterpieces, wire controllers directly in to your contraptions, connect easy to use switches, microchips and circuit boards to build epic bosses, vehicles, machines, and puzzles.
With our new toolset in your little burlap hands, you?ll have all the ingredients of a great game laid out before you, waiting for you to stew them up into something nutritious.

game.name: Littlebigplanet Karting
game.desc: LittleBigPlanet Karting is an arcade kart racing game and the successor to ModNation Racers, but now directly based on the LittleBigPlanet franchise. In numerous tracks or arenas the player can race against human opponents or computer-controlled rivals, either with up to four players on a single console or up to eight player online.

game.name: Littlebigplanet 3
game.desc: LittleBigPlanet 3 is the third main game in the puzzle-platformer series and created by a different developer than the previous two. The game has an overarching story for the first time, with voiced supporting characters and cut-scene sequences, and it is set in Bunkum where the familiar Sackboy character meets Newton. He tricks Sackboy into unleashing three Titans, creatures that were locked up because they robbed the world of creativity.

game.name: Littlebigplanet
game.desc: LittleBigPlanet is a puzzle platformer where the player controls sackboys. It takes the characters on an adventure through levels with different themes and settings, trying to reach the end of each level alive. The platforming is based entirely on physics where the sackboys can push or pull items, or generally manipulate them with their movement or weight. In addition to running, jumping, pushing and pulling, it is also necessary to master grabbing dangling objects and swinging from them to get over some obstacles and traps.

game.name: Ghost Recon : Future Soldier
game.desc: Developed by the award-winning team behind Tom Clancy's Ghost Recon Advanced Warfighter and Tom Clancy's Ghost Recon Advanced Warfighter 2, the game will feature cutting-edge technology, prototype high-tech weaponry, and state-of-the-art single-player and multiplayer modes. Tom Clancy's Ghost Recon: Future Soldier will go beyond the core Ghost Recon franchise and deliver a fresh gameplay experience, with an unparalleled level of quality that will excite long-time fans and newcomers alike.
